title: Agriculture Appeals Act 2001 (No. 29 of 2001) (as adapted by the Agriculture,
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001 
(Amendment of Schedule) Regulations 2021.

title: Agriculture Appeals Act 2001 (No. 29 of 2001) (as adapted by the Agriculture,
heading: Schemes
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 1 

Schemes

Agri-Environment Pilot Project 

Agri-Environment Training Scheme

(AWRBS)

Basic Payment Scheme (BPS)

Beef Exceptional Aid Measure (BEAM) 

Beef Finisher Payment (BFP) 

Beef Genomics Scheme (BGS) 

Beef Data and Genomics Programme (BDGP) 

Bio Energy Scheme 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th July, 2021.

title: Agriculture Appeals Act 2001 (No. 29 of 2001) (as adapted by the Agriculture,
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations have the purpose of updating Schedule 1 of the Act setting 
out the list of Schemes which may be referred to the Agriculture Appeals 
Office for appeal. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [368] 7
